backend/main.mo: Defines the primary actor with extensive type definitions for media, users, ads, referrals, wallets, and pending approval workflows, integrating storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module that returns the previous actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high-level summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application and defining basic metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, including admin routes wrapped in AdminRouteGuard, and sets the app layout.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Displays a single active banner ad, tracking views and clicks via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessDenie: Shows an access-denied screen for non-admin users with a button to return home.
Protects admin routes by checking admin status, handling loading states, and showing denial UI when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/AdSidebar.tsx: Renders up to three active sidebar ads with automatic view tracking and click handling.
Displays a grid of predefined media categories as clickable cards that navigate to category-specific pages.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoomComponen: Implements a chat room UI with message polling, text/file message sending, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ContentCard.tsx: Renders a media content preview card showing type, title, stats, and an interactive hover play overlay.
frontend/src/components/ContentGrid.tsx: Shows all and popular media content in tabbed grids and opens a player when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/ContentPlayer.ts: Provides a modal player for video, audio, or images with playback controls, rating, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/DisplayScreen.ts: Displays the currently active content with auto-playing video and metadata for a display screen view.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, social icons, and admin login integration.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, search, authentication, and admin menu logic responsive for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing hero section with animated visuals, headline text, and navigation buttons to streaming and wallet pages.
frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx: Interactive assistant widget with chat, speech recognition, speech synthesis, and personalized memory storage.
frontend/src/components/JitsiMeetIntegra: Component that loads and manages a Jitsi Meet video conference with event handling and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, background styling, route outlet, and conditional HeroHelper display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple modal form allowing users to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/SharedPlaybackCo: UI card for shared playback rooms with placeholder media, playback toggles, and room creation button.
frontend/src/components/VersionBadge.tsx: Renders nothing to hide version info from the UI.
frontend/src/components/VideoCallCompone: Provides a video call UI with mute, video toggle, and end-call actions using state and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/WAN22Integration: Implements a WAN 2.2 content creation interface with form inputs, simulated API generation, and project handling.
frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts: Defines admin navigation sections, ordered menu items, and route mappings for the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports an empty application version constant.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries on identity change.
Derives actor capability flags based on the loaded actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides numerous React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including admin checks, image library operations, and various pending approval workflows.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global TailwindCSS styles, theme variables, responsive typography, overflow handling, and utility classes for consistent UI layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAdsPage.tsx: Implements an admin UI for creating, listing, editing, deleting, and toggling advertisements with form handling and CTR calculation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAffiliatePage.ts: Provides an interface to create affiliate tiers and display existing tiers using React Query and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApprovalPage.tsx: Aggregates multiple approval queues (content, members, admins, card loads, prices, payouts, images) and provides actions to approve or reject pending items.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentPage.tsx: Provides a form to upload new multimedia content and a list to delete existing items, using query hooks for create and delete operations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDisplayPage.tsx: Manages theater display screen content by showing the currently active item and offering a form to upload new display content.
Displays pending content submissions with search, allowing admins to approve, reject, or delete various content types.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHiiYahChatPage.t: Handles approval and rejection of broadcast and hero join requests with tabbed views for different request categories.
frontend/src/pages/AdminImageLibraryPage: Manages image uploads, approvals, rejections, downloads, and viewing of pending and approved images with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteAcceptPage: Handles accepting admin invitation tokens, triggering login if needed and redeeming the invite via actor API, with status feedback and automatic navigation on success.
Displays, generates, and copies admin invite codes using actor API, separating available and used codes with UI actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMallPage.tsx: Provides a local CRUD interface for managing mall items, including creating, editing, deleting, and listing inventory with totals.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMediaUploadRoomP: Allows admins to upload media content with progress tracking and lists existing content filtered by media type.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMemberDirectoryP: Fetches all user profiles and provides search and role-based filtering in a tabular member directory.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPriceControlRoom: Admin page for managing subscription, content, and mall pricing with tabs and save actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPricingTermsPage: Admin interface to edit terms and conditions and manage subscription pricing with version loading and save support.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoomsPage.tsx: Lists all admin sections as navigable cards excluding the current page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletManagement: Dashboard showing wallet seeds, search, visibility toggling, and mock BTC balance monitoring.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Affiliate dashboard for generating referral links, viewing stats, and determining current tier.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays content for a given category and allows selecting and playing specific items.
frontend/src/pages/CreditCardPage.tsx: UI for a mock Excalibur credit card, showing card visuals and a placeholder balance loading feature requiring login.
Creative workspace page with hero section, tabs, and integrations for Jitsi Meet and WAN 2.2.
frontend/src/pages/FlixiodTestPage.tsx: Test page for Flixiod streaming featuring an embedded player, navigation controls, and integration info.
frontend/src/pages/HiiYahChatPage.tsx: Rocket.Chatâ€‘powered messaging hub with authentication checks, connection code placeholders, and tabs for chat, calls, and shared playback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing featured content sections, global streaming intro, and financial service highlights with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/IHeartRadioTestPage.t: Provides an iHeartRadio test page with an embedded streaming iframe and navigation back to the streaming partners list.
frontend/src/pages/MallPage.tsx: Displays the Clear Magic Mall page with branding, search input, and a coming-soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Implements a user registration form with validation and a submitted state confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/StreamingPartnersPage: Lists streaming partner platforms with navigation to test pages or external links.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays active terms and conditions with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Manages the Excalibur Wallet UI including wallet creation, loading funds, and viewing wallet info.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines TypeScript types mirroring expected backend data structures for media, approvals, admin requests, transactions, and chat models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, outstanding issues, and feature requests related to admin flow, version label removal, and admin detection.
